title: 103_hr3735
content: Emergency Supplemental Appropriations for Disaster Assistance Because of the Los Angeles Earthquake Act of 1994 - Makes emergency supplemental appropriations for FY 1994 for disaster assistance activities resulting from the January 1994 earthquake in Southern California and other disasters. Makes additional funds available to: (1) the Small Business Administration for the disaster loans program account. (2) the Department of Education for impact aid and student financial assistance, (3) the Department of Transportation for the Federal Highway Administration, (4) the Department of Veterans Affairs for medical care. (5) the Department of Housing and Urban Development for housing programs and community development, (6) the Federal Emergency Management Agency for disaster relief, and (7) the President for unanticipated needs.
